PyAnnotation Module - PyFeatureStructure.py¶

class PyFeatureStructure.PyFeatureStructure(type=None)[source]¶

A list of C{PyFeature}s indexed by name.

__init__(type=None)[source]¶

Constructor for C{PyFeatureStructure}.

Parameters:type – C{str}
add(name, value)[source]¶

Creates a new feature and adds it to this C{PyFeatureStructure}’s list of elements.

Parameters:
  • name – C{str}
  • value – C{str}
find(name, create=True)[source]¶

Removes ‘/’ chars at start or end of name so it is not done repeatedly during recursive search.

Parameters:
  • name – C{str}
  • create – C{bool}
